returns.contractNames: Array of all contract names in the protocol

returns.totalContracts: Total number of contracts in protocol

returns.contractName: Name of the contract if registered
returns.isRegistered: Whether the address is registered in the protocol

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

getAllContractAddresses().notice: Get all protocol contract addresses at once

getContractAddress(string).notice: Get the address of a contract by name

getContractNames().notice: Get list of contract names for iteration

isContractRegistered(address).notice: Check if a contract address is registered

setContractAddress(string,address).notice: Set the address of a protocol contract
